description:
Equipping anchors or bolting in solid rock? These hangers are for use with 3/8in or 10mm bolts, and conform to the 2018 update to CE standards.

  • 316L stainless steel provides excellent corrosion resistance
  • Rounded inner hanger edge for less carabiner wear
  • Strength is 25kN down, 25kN straight out
  • 3 anti-rotation pins help hold hanger in the intended orientation
name: Fixe 316 SS Bolt Hanger 3/8"
